title: I need help with choosing a jg champion.
body: Soooo... I love playing jg even tho I'm a noob. I usually go warwick, xin zhao, or shaco jg. But I really want a jg champion that can 1 hit or 2 hit squishies at late game. Btw please don't suggest master yi. I suck at him.

replies.body: Rengar, as an ex-main I can tell you he's really easy to pick up and learn and when fed is easily known as the "one shot kitty". You can also try out kha zix but he is a little bit more difficult to pick up and learn since he's really mana hungry early and requires good positioning in fights.

{{champion:131}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:104}} 

those are probably the best, but the problem with 1 shotters are they can be a bit feast or famine.

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=LxK2Oji3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-28T19:32:53.104+0000)
>
> {{champion:131}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:104}} 
> 
> those are probably the best, but the problem with 1 shotters are they can be a bit feast or famine.

Yeah these are solid.
Full ap Zac is pretty fun to one shot people with

{{champion:28}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:35}} 

**Evelyn **is OP Early game but is squishy, 
**Jax **Probs the tankiest and does ton of damage late game if built correctly 
**Nidalee** Shes making a come back but rare to see her anymore, A good nidalee can one shot people Early - Mid - Late when spear is perfect distance
**Shaco** Shaco is my Fave and main jungler, Once get warriors (_**RUSH IE**_) then Hydra and youre pretty much clean up crew when you knife in the back 

Cheeseyleeks's Picks are good Rengar and Khazix are better picks and better for ganks,

**Edit**:_ Realised you mentioned shaco above_

{{champion:56}} 
1 shots the same as the rest but you get a spellshield + fear for even less counterplay, not to mention no one respects the fact that you can ult them from dragon to there bot and mid tier 1 @ level 11.

YI. Seriously. He is very good in low elo and low level games, all you have to do is learn a few simple mechanical strategies, farm the jg and have good timing. He is very fun and rewarding especially when you dodge an ult by pressing q.
